sources.title: All This and Rabbit Stew (1941)
sources.description: All This and Rabbit Stew is a 1941 Merrie Melodies cartoon directed by Tex Avery. The cartoon was released on September 13, 1941, and features Bugs Bunny. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/all-this-and-rabbit-stew-1941/

metadata.Plot: The cartoon opens with a slow-witted black hunter saying "I'm gonna get me a rhaaa-bittt!" He sees rabbit tracks that lead him straight to Bugs Bunny's hole. Bugs heckles the hunter by telling him which way the rabbit went, luring him into a bear cave (phewww!), followed by bullets following Bugs from hole to hole. Will he ever catch that rhaaa-bittt ?
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Darrell Payne, Danny Webb
